SUITABILITY.TITLE: Suitability Map
SUITABILITY.DESCRIPTION: Shows what crops are best to plant in a specific area to attain maximum yield.

LEVELS.TITLE: Suitability Level
LEVELS.2: Moderately suitable with limitation in elevation
LEVELS.3: Moderately suitable with limitation in slope
LEVELS.4: Moderately suitable with limitation in soil
LEVELS.5: Moderately suitable with limitation in elevation and slope
LEVELS.6: Moderately suitable with limitation in slope and soil
LEVELS.7: Moderately suitable with limitation in elevation and soil
LEVELS.8: Moderately suitable with limitation in elevation, slope and soil
LEVELS.9: Marginally suitable with limitation in elevation
LEVELS.10: Marginally suitable with limitation in slope
LEVELS.11: Marginally suitable with limitation in soil
LEVELS.12: Marginally suitable with limitation in elevation and slope
LEVELS.13: Marginally suitable with limitation in slope and soil
LEVELS.14: Marginally suitable with limitation in elevation and soil
LEVELS.15: Marginally suitable with limitation in elevation, slope and soil
